articles.author: Janaki Jitchotvisut
articles.title: Updated 2024 Honda Africa Twin Touches Down In America - RideApart.com
articles.description: For 2024, Honda updated the Africa Twin lineup with engine tweaks, suspension tweaks, and more, offering more capability for both on- and off-road adventure.
articles.content:
Honda Africa Twin fans, if you've been waiting anxiously for the 2024 lineup to come to America, you can now officially breathe a sigh of relief. We're happy to announce that your wait is now over.
